meta.name: note
meta.content: Not clear what the edition was

chapter.name: July 1: Holy & Unmercenary Physicians & Wonder-workers Cosmas & Damian
July 1: Nicodemus of the Holy Mountain
July 2: Juvenal, Patriarch of Jerusalem
July 2: Deposition of the Robe of the Theotokos
July 3: Holy Martyr Hyacinth
July 4: Saint Andrew the Jerusalemite, Archbishop of Crete

July 5: Grand Duchess Elizabeth
July 5: St. Sergius the Wonder-worker, Abbot of Radonezh
July 5: Commemoration of the Venerable Martyrs Elizabeth & Barbara
July 6: St. Sisoës the Great
July 6: Righteous Virgin Juliana, Princess Ol’shanskaya
July 7: Sts. Thomas of Mount Maleum & Acacius of Mount Sinai
July 7: Holy Greatmartyr Procopius

July 9: Holy Hieromartyr Pancratius

July 11: Martyr Euphemia the All-praised & St. Olga
July 11: Commemoration of the Holy & Blessed Olga
July 12: Holy Martyrs Proclus & Hilarius
July 12: Commemoration of the Image of the Theotokos "Icon of the Three Hands"
July 13: Synaxis of the Holy Archangel Gabriel
Sunday closest to July 16: Holy Fathers of the Six Ecumenical Councils
July 14: Holy Apostle Aquila
July 15: Holy Prince Vladimir the Great, Equal of the Apostles
July 16: Holy Hieromartyr Athenogenes

July 18: Holy Martyr Emilian

July 20: Holy and Glorious Prophet Elijah
July 21: Sts. Symeon, the Fool for Christ’s Sake & John, His Companion

July 23: Holy Martyrs Trophimus, Theophilus, and those with them

July 24: Holy Passion-Bearers Boris & Gleb
July 25: Dormition of the Righteous Anna, the Mother of the All-holy Theotokos
July 26: Holy Hieromartyr Hermolaus

July 26: St. Moses of the Carpathians
July 27: Holy Great Martyr and Healer Panteleimon
